title: Our Team
description: This is general info about our team.
defaultTextContent: Choose a tab to find out more about us

members.name: Felix
members.textContent: Felix's main efforts were the design of the website through CSS and a little bit of JavaScript, keeping the team organised by using GitHub for version control and Trello for task management. Shown is a picture of his cat, Smudge.

members.name: Harry
members.textContent: Harry Auton-Randall was one of the larger contributors at the beginning of development, coding the html for the home page, tab functionality for the content and team pages, and the first attempt at dynamically loaded content. He also wrote the site guide, and assisted with other miscellaneous tasks.
